plot: Ryoji has got turned down for a interview, dumped by his girlfriend, walks along the river in the early morning. Then he finds beautiful woman Sora (means Sky in Japanese). Attracted to her...
title: Saiakuna hino yoku hareta sora
plot_es: Ryoji has got turned down for a interview, dumped by his girlfriend, walks along the river in the early morning. Then he finds beautiful woman Sora (means Sky in Japanese). Attracted to her...
plot_en: Ryoji has got turned down for a interview, dumped by his girlfriend, walks along the river in the early morning. Then he finds beautiful woman Sora (means Sky in Japanese). Attracted to her...
